    V

    view - package view
     
    View - Interface in view
    The View interface defines a set of methods for displaying messages and prompting user input.
    viewAllItems() - Method in class controller.ItemsController
    Displays all loaded items to the console via the ItemsView.
    viewAllPokemon() - Method in class controller.PokemonController
    Displays all currently loaded Pokemon using the view.
    viewAllPokemon(ArrayList<Pokemon>) - Method in class view.PokemonView
    Displays a shortened view of all the Pokemon entries in the given list.

    viewItems(ArrayList<Items>) - Method in class view.ItemsView
    Displays a list of Items to the terminal.
    viewMoves() - Method in class controller.MovesController
    Displays all available moves using the MovesView.
    viewMoveSet(Pokemon) - Method in class view.PokemonView
    Displays all moves from the Pokemon's moveset, given that the value isn't null.
    viewPokemon(Pokemon) - Method in class view.PokemonView
    Displays the detailed information of a single Pokemon, including Pokedex number, name, types, base stats, and evolution information.
    viewTrainer(Trainer) - Method in class view.TrainerView
